channel.title: Academy of Bored Ones
channel.description: Recent content on Academy of Bored Ones

item.title: Migrating to New Platform
item.description: Why? This summer the motherboard of my MacBook Pro is damaged(?) and Genius Bar replaced a new one without treasuring my data. All articles were lost. :( I really doubt if it was damaged. It cannot be charged at first but resetting SMC controller and NVRAM would not take effect. Maybe some chips are burnt out? What to do? You see, I am writing this article in a new website to keep my blog functioning.
item.content:
Why?

This summer the motherboard of my MacBook Pro is damaged(?) and Genius Bar replaced a new one without treasuring my data. All articles were lost. :(

I really doubt if it was damaged. It cannot be charged at first but resetting SMC controller and NVRAM would not take effect. Maybe some chips are burnt out?

What to do?

You see, I am writing this article in a new website to keep my blog functioning. However recovering all articles is very hard and seems to be impossible at the time.

So what?

So you cannot see previous articles from now on. $$ \frac{1}{2} $$

item.title: What is FlifeX
item.description: Basic Properties FlifeX (Homo sapiens sp. sapiens, L.) is modern human in the usual sense. It is observed that it has an ability to hijack normal daaaaata transfferinggg and maakke normaal t3xtt b3c0?mm3 n_nn00t u/Nd3f1n-nn3?444b111e..???/.?? Rewrite starting… Who am I I am FlifeX. It (FlifeX) does not imply any meanings in any language. It was just a stupid name I came up with by rolling my face on the keyboard.
item.content:
Basic Properties

FlifeX (Homo sapiens sp. sapiens, L.) is modern human in the usual sense.

It is observed that it has an ability to hijack normal daaaaata transfferinggg and maakke normaal t3xtt b3c0?mm3 n_nn00t u/Nd3f1n-nn3?444b111e..???/.??

Rewrite starting…

Who am I

I am FlifeX. It (FlifeX) does not imply any meanings in any language. It was just a stupid name I came up with by rolling my face on the keyboard.
